backend/main.mo: Main Motoko backend actor managing user sessions, messages, artwork, and music storage with blob storage integration; provides functions for user registration, session management, message handling, and artwork/music sharing and retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including Save/Share buttons for ArtCanvas and MusicGenerator components, plus a shared content viewer page, with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing components, hooks, and configuration for Axora AI application including chat, math solver, media generation, translation, music generation, and art canvas features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space, including background, foreground, primary, secondary, accent, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with page title "Axora AI" and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with TanStack Router setup, authentication via Internet Identity, tabbed interface for various AI tools (chat, math, media, translation, music, art), and routes for shared content viewing.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush controls, eraser tool, AI idea generator chat panel, and Save/Share functionality that generates shareable URLs and downloads PNG images.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar component that displays a list of chat sessions with timestamps, allows creating new chats, and handles session selection.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Main chat interface component that displays messages in a conversation, handles user input with textarea, and simulates AI responses with alternating user/bot message styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, title, theme toggle (light/dark mode), and sign-out button for authenticated users using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver component with difficulty level selection (K-12), teacher mode toggle for detailed explanations, and client-side expression evaluation with step-by-step solutions.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Tabbed media gallery component for generating AI images and videos from text prompts, with upload functionality and progress tracking for both media types.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation component with AI prompt-based audio creation and a beat pattern sequencer for kick/snare/hihat sounds, including playback controls, tempo adjustment, and music sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: React component that displays shared artwork or music content by ID, handling loading states, errors, and rendering appropriate UI with navigation and playback controls.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Chat-style translator component with language selection dropdowns, message history display, and real-time translation using the useTranslation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates art idea suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food), returning contextual creative prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook that converts canvas drawings to PNG blobs, uploads them to the backend as ExternalBlob with unique IDs, and provides URL copying functionality for sharing.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API based on text prompts, creating simple melodies and converting AudioBuffers to WAV blobs for playback and storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Hook managing canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, color/brush size control, eraser mode, and canvas clearing with proper coordinate scaling.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Provides React hooks for managing chat sessions and messages using React Query, including fetching sessions, adding messages, and creating new sessions with the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Provides hooks for generating placeholder AI images and videos using canvas, simulating generation delays and creating visual representations with gradients and animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Handles music sharing functionality by converting audio blobs to ExternalBlob format, uploading to backend actor, and generating shareable URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: Provides React Query hooks for retrieving shared artwork and music by ID from the backend actor, returning blob data and direct URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Implements a mock translation hook with simulated API delays, generating placeholder translations for common phrases across multiple languages.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a dark theme using teal primary and coral accent colors, plus sidebar styling and Google Fonts imports.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines a dark mode theme with custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, extended utilities for borders/shadows, custom animations (accordion, slide-in, fade-in), and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file for 'Axora AI' (formerly 'Hollow AI'), documenting an AI application with dark theme that includes multi-modal content display, K-12+ math solver with teacher mode, chat history sidebar, text-to-image/video generation, language translation, music generation, and an art canvas with AI creative suggestions.
